goal.ch:
"1. 引導學員了解管理學理論的基本概念及其在生活與工作上的實際應用。
2. 幫助學員建立管理學的概念，使其得以應用相關知識於其日常生活中。"
goal.en:
"1. Boot the students understand the basic concepts of management theory and its practical application in life and work.
2. To help students to establish the concept of management, to enable them to apply the knowledge to their daily life."
